entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.1Â°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
